_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: DDRace
author: admin@primhosting.com
description:
mkRace server modification of Teeworlds.
A Teeworlds modification with a unique cooperative gameplay. Help each other play through custom maps with up to 64 players.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Installation Script for mkRace w/ source.
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apt-get update
apt -y install git
cd /mnt/server/
git clone https://github.com/SNSnoop/mkRace --recurse-submodules .
mkdir -p build

cd build/
echo -e '#Name of the servser
sv_name "Untitled Server"

#Message of the day
sv_motd Welcome to my server

#Server port
sv_port 8303

#Server password proteted? Leave blank for no
password ""

#Server console password (Admin password)
sv_rcon_password "ChangeMe"

#Whether to register on the master serverlist (1 for yes, 0 for no)
sv_register 1

#Max amount of clients that can connect (Maximum 64)
sv_max_clients 16

#Max amounts of clients per ip
sv_max_clients_per_ip 4

#Gametype (dm = deathmatch, tdm = team deathmatch, ctf = capture the flag)
sv_gametype ctf

sv_map ctf2

#Score to reach to win the game
sv_scorelimit 20

#Limit game by time (Set to 0 for no time limit)
sv_timelimit 0

#Allow team damage? (0 for false, 1 for true)
sv_teamdamage 0

#Is the server in tournament? (0 for no, 1 for yes)
sv_tournament_mode 0' > autoexec.cfg
